attributes.action: Allow the use of red diesel in all HGV vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By allowing the use of red diesel in all UK based HGV vehicles it would lower the cost to the haulage company having the knock on effect of lowering the cost they have to charge the customer which would in turn lower the cost of the product to the general public. Giving the public more money and helping to lower the national dept
